REWRITE YOUR GENETIC CODE: During force construction, you may add the FFFF #s008 Isotope E to your force at no point cost and it doesn't count towards your object total.

DatHomieSilverSurfer
spectacular piece for 30 clix, needing at least 2 attacks to finish him off, and with his prob, outwit, 11 AV and psb, your opponent won't be able to ignore him. Even if he just came with prob, this is probably the best value you'll get out of Isotope E, so if you wanted to add 60pt SR spidey to your F4 team without breaking THEME, this is the way to do it.
